author: N. L. (Nicholas Ling), fl. 1580-1607.
Bodenham, John, fl. 1600, attributed name.
publisher: Printed by I. R[oberts] for Nicholas Ling, and are to bee solde at the vvest doore of Paules,
notes: Sometimes attributed to John Bodenham, who planned the collection.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Aphorisms and apothegms --  Early works to 1800.
